#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Timetable can be viewed for either a Qualification, Class Group or Venue


= Details =

The first shows the time table as well as a calender on the left that allows the selection of the date for the Timetable.   By default the current date is selected.  

Below the calender is several drop down boxes that allow you to select based on Qualification, Class Group or Venue.
